    • 方法详细资料

      • getFileFromAssets

        public static java.lang.String getFileFromAssets(android.content.Context context,
                                 java.lang.String fileName)
        get an asset using ACCESS_STREAMING mode. This provides access to files that have been bundled with an application as assets -- that is, files placed in to the "assets" directory.
        参数:
        context -
        fileName - The name of the asset to open. This name can be hierarchical.
        返回:

      • getFileFromRaw

        public static java.lang.String getFileFromRaw(android.content.Context context,
                              int resId)
        get content from a raw resource. This can only be used with resources whose value is the name of an asset files -- that is, it can be used to open drawable, sound, and raw resources; it will fail on string and color resources.
        参数:
        context -
        resId - The resource identifier to open, as generated by the appt tool.
        返回:

      • getFileToListFromAssets

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileToListFromAssets(android.content.Context context,
                                                       java.lang.String fileName)
        same to getFileFromAssets(android.content.Context, String), but return type is List
        参数:
        context -
        fileName -
        返回:

      • getFileToListFromRaw

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFileToListFromRaw(android.content.Context context,
                                                    int resId)
        same to getFileFromRaw(android.content.Context, int), but return type is List
        参数:
        context -
        resId -
        返回:
